name: Last Half of Darkness - Society of the Serpent Moon
description: Society of the Serpent Moon is a "Point and Click" style adventure where the player investigates and explores a mysterious small European town, uncovering the secrets behind Vampire-like murders that are plaguing its dark streets. BONUS: 3 Additional "Last Half" Games included FREE!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 1.5Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card with 128 MB memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible

reviews.review_text: This is an adventure game in the style of Sierra Online's original 'Quest' titles, like King's Quest, Space Quest and Police Quest. No previous knowledge of prior 'Last Half of Darkness' games is required to play or to understand the storyline. In order to find and save your girlfriend from a dark cult, you explore various fixed-camera scenes in a seedy town for clues. I found the puzzles fun and solving them was great satisfaction for a player who is normally stumped on games like this with without a walkthrough. The most difficult aspect for me was finding all the objects that are needed as tools in other locations. Be sure to search every nook and cranny for usable items.  This steam package also includes a free copy of Tomb of Zojir and 3 other games. Tomb of Zojir is a 'must play' for fans of the genre and is worth the price of admission alone!
Games are not for everyone but for an adventure gamer getting 4 games for this price is awesome and although the games are dated, they are still pretty good!
